question-i18n.question: La principal fuente de energía en España es:

question: The main source of energy in Spain is:

answer-i18n.answers:
V Combustibles fósiles
X Viento
X Sol
X Nuclear

explanation-i18n.explanation: Las energías renovables suponen un 12% de la energía primaria utilizada. El 88% restante corresponde al uso de combustibles fósiles (76%) y energía nuclear (12%).

answers:
V Fossil fuels
X Wind
X Sun
X Nuclear
title: 222 main source of energy
explanation: Renewable energy accounts for 12% of the primary energy used. The remaining 88% corresponds to the use of fossil fuels (76%) and nuclear energy (12%).
